tool_description: The perfectpdf api converts html to pdf.
name: perfectpdf
title: perfectpdf

api_list.name: /perfectpdf/api
api_list.description: Converts HTML string to PDF string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://perfectpdf.p.rapidapi.com/perfectpdf/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perfectpdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://perfectpdf.p.rapidapi.com/perfectpdf/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perfectpdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
